name: ~SILENCE_FALLS~
description:
shateiel, angel of silence has come to lay the world to rest~

Made in 3 days for minijam with a  heaven theme
(everything can die, is almost literal, just not very functional)

{GAME CONTAINS *SEVERE* FLASHING LIGHTS]

[CONTROLS]
(controller recommended)

up-down-left-right => WASD, ArrowKeys, Gamepad  DPAD

turning => IJKL, Gamepad Face Buttons

Shoot => space , right bumper

Sword => alt, left bumper

Forward => shift , right trigger

Back => left ctrl , left trigger

quit by pressing alt+f4

Made by:
Blood Machine

wren 『773tk』
